B2 someone who advises people on a particular subject: a management/financial/computer consultant a firm of public relations consultants
UK a hospital doctor at the highest level with special training in and knowledge of a particular area of medicine: She is an ear, nose, and throat consultant at a large teaching hospital. He was on a waiting list to see a consultant about his back. a consultant psychiatrist/paediatrician/obstetrician a consultant dermatologist/gynaecologist/cardiologist Synonym
